org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.extendedonthefly

Class ExtendedOnTheFlyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.extendedonthefly.ExtendedOnTheFlyUtil

  • public class ExtendedOnTheFlyUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some utility methods for the on-the-fly translation algorithms.
    Author:
    Wen-Chin Chan

      Returns true if the specified LTL formula is an elementary formula.
      static LTL preprocessFormula(LTL formula)
      Replaces "f --> g" and "f <--> g" sub-formulae in a specified formula to "~ f ∨ g" and "(~ f ∨ g) ∧ (f ∨ ~g)" respectively.

      • isElementary

        public static boolean isElementary(LTL formula)
        Returns true if the specified LTL formula is an elementary formula.
        Parameters:
        formula - a LTL formula
        Returns:
        true if formula is an elementary formula

      • preprocessFormula

        public static LTL preprocessFormula(LTL formula)
        Replaces "f --> g" and "f <--> g" sub-formulae in a specified formula to "~ f ∨ g" and "(~ f ∨ g) ∧ (f ∨ ~g)" respectively.
        Parameters:
        formula - a formula
        Returns:
        the rewritten formula

      • alphaOne

        public static java.util.Set<LTL> alphaOne(LTL mu)
                                   throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Returns the set of α1(mu). Refer to Improved Automata Generation for Linear Temporal Logic for more details.
        Parameters:
        mu - an LTL formula
        Returns:
        α1(mu)
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the formula mu is not supported
